title: THE RUINS OF A VILLAGE
description: Detective Logico returned to the quaint little village where he had first followed Dame Obsidian. Now, half the houses were for sale. The other half were empty. A mysterious figure was running around the town, and nobody knew where the shopkeep was. Then Logico found a murder weapon, and he knew what had happened to the shopkeep.

suspects.name: MISTER SHADOW
suspects.description: A silhouette in shadow. He moves like the wind and he looks like the night.

suspects.name: FATHER MANGO
suspects.description: He has taken a vow of poverty, but he drives a BMW. He's taken a vow of obedience, but he has a staff of twenty-five. He's taken a vow of chastity, too, which is why he's on vacation.

suspects.name: LORD LAVENDER
suspects.description: A politically conservative MP in the House of Lords, as well as the musical theater composer behind such hits as The Shadow of the Orchestra: Everything Dies.

suspects.name: OFFICER COPPER
suspects.description: The best part of being a policewoman criminal is that you can cut out the middleman and fail to investigate your own crimes.

weapons.name: YARN
weapons.description: Sometimes, when you realize you've missed a stitch, you could just strangle somebody.

weapons.name: AN ANTIQUE FLINTLOCK
weapons.description: It takes only twenty-five minutes to load this.

weapons.name: A KNITTING NEEDLE
weapons.description: You could knit a sweater or a garrote.

weapons.name: A BOTTLE OF CYANIDE
weapons.description: Almond-scented poison in a quaint little bottle.

locations.name: THE NEW DEVELOPMENT
locations.description: This new development will either revitalize the community or ruin it, depending on who you ask.

locations.name: THE ANCIENT RUINS
locations.description: Is it possible they were some kind of beacon?

locations.name: THE CHAPEL
locations.description: A tiny church with stained-glass windows and secrets.

locations.name: THE QUAINT GARDEN
locations.description: A quaint little garden for growing herbs and flowers. But there might have been some new mounds of dirt lately, of a suspicious size and shape.

motives: AS PART OF A REAL ESTATE SCAM
clues: Lord Lavender had not been in the quaint garden.
Whoever wanted to steal an idea had green eyes.
Father Mango was seen hanging around beneath a stained-glass window.
The person who wanted to steal a body was in the ancient ruins.
Whoever was in the new development had a medium-weight weapon.
Whoever might kill as part of a real estate scam was an Aquarius.
If you are going to scare a bear away, you are going to need a weapon made of metal.
Logico found a knitting needle that was covered in blood.
